about_the_game:
"Desk Fantasy: Zodiac Odyssey" is an idle life-simulator RPG that seamlessly integrates into your desktop environment. You play as an adventurer on a tiny planetoid, leading a dynamic life full of exploration, quests, and relationships while you go about your daily computer activities. Experience the magical blend of life simulation and RPG mechanics with over 100 unlockable classes and a rich variety of items, quests, and biomes. Manage your adventurer's activities, collect rewards, and unlock new abilities as you aim for the ultimate goal: achieving Zodiac divinity.

Key Features:
  • Idle Life-Simulator RPG: Guide your adventurer through daily activities, training, and quests.
  • Job System: Over 100 unlockable classes that shape skills, events, and attributes.
  • Gacha System: Collect loot and relics automatically while you use your computer, and retrieve them with a claw mechanism.
  • Quest System: Undertake quests of varying difficulty (Ranks E to S) to earn rewards and Gacha Coins.
  • Customization: Equip your adventurer with over 1,000 items, including equipment and relics, to create a unique character.
  • Slow-Paced Gameplay: Designed to run in the background with a slow and contemplative time progression.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
  • VR Support: NO
